EmailTemplate.name: AOG UPS Activation
EmailTemplate.subject: **URGENT!! 4-HR AOG ALERT** Will Call Job #:
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello UPS Critical,
Please activate Will Call job ##### for immediate collection.
- Customer: {!Case.Account} - Customer PO: {!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c} - Pickup location: XXX - HON Sales Orders: {!Case.Sales_Order_Number__c} - Part Number: {!Case.Part_Number__c} - Weight: ### - Dimensions: ###
Destination: XXX
Please confirm activation by reply to this message.
Thank you,
Honeywell AOG Customer Support Team http://www.MyAerospace.com
NOTE: International shipment responsibilities such as import clearance, duties, fees or taxes (if applicable), and/or any other country specific requirements are the sole responsibility of the customer/receiving party.
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
